model

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Door

  • public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of doors from the labyrinth, it also manage the switches.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Door(Vertex switchOn, Vertex switchOff, Edge door)
      Create a door and the switches linked to it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean correctSwitchPosition(java.util.ArrayList<Door> _closedDoor, AbstractCandy[] candyList, Vertex actualSwitch, Vertex exitDoor)
      Check if the position of the actual switch we want to put is not already used by another Switch or Candy or the exit door or the player himself.
      Edge getDoor()
      Getter on the Edge corresponding to the door location.
      Vertex getSwitchOff()
      Retrieves the Vertex corresponding to the location of the switch used to close the door.
      static java.lang.String getSwitchOffPath()
      Retrieves a string corresponding to the path of the image for the switch used to close a door.
      Vertex getSwitchOn()
      Retrieves the Vertex corresponding to the location of the switch used to open the door.
      static java.lang.String getSwitchOnPath()
      Retrieves a string corresponding to the path of the image for the switch used to open a door.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(Vertex switchOn,
            Vertex switchOff,
            Edge door)
        Create a door and the switches linked to it. Create a door from an Edge, and the two switches from two Vertices.
        Parameters:
        switchOn - A Vertex corresponding to the coordinates of the switch which will open the door.
        switchOff - A Vertex corresponding to the coordinates of the switch which will close the door.
        door - An Edge where the door will be set.

    • Method Detail

      • getDoor

        public Edge getDoor()
        Getter on the Edge corresponding to the door location.
        Returns:
        The Edge of the door.

      • getSwitchOnPath

        public static java.lang.String getSwitchOnPath()
        Retrieves a string corresponding to the path of the image for the switch used to open a door.
        Returns:
        The path to image of the switch.

      • getSwitchOffPath

        public static java.lang.String getSwitchOffPath()
        Retrieves a string corresponding to the path of the image for the switch used to close a door.
        Returns:
        The path to image of the switch.

      • getSwitchOn

        public Vertex getSwitchOn()
        Retrieves the Vertex corresponding to the location of the switch used to open the door.
        Returns:
        The position of the switch in a Vertex.

      • getSwitchOff

        public Vertex getSwitchOff()
        Retrieves the Vertex corresponding to the location of the switch used to close the door.
        Returns:
        The position of the switch in a Vertex.

      • correctSwitchPosition

        public static boolean correctSwitchPosition(java.util.ArrayList<Door> _closedDoor,
                                            AbstractCandy[] candyList,
                                            Vertex actualSwitch,
                                            Vertex exitDoor)
        Check if the position of the actual switch we want to put is not already used by another Switch or Candy or the exit door or the player himself.
        Parameters:
        _closedDoor - The array containing all closed door.
        candyList - The array containing all Candies.
        actualSwitch - The switch to be tested
        exitDoor - The vertex of the exit door.
        Returns:
        True, if there is nothing else, except enemies, at the same position, otherwise return false.
